Text.Language: Nicabeu t/rou n~te Pic~ra/l n/eterhwb e~nikap n~noub mayamio n~ous~y/n n~Aa~rwn: kata p~taio n~]metou/b...
O all you wise men of Israel, the makers of golden thread, make a robe of Aaron befitting the honor of the priesthood...
